character.name: Chun-Li
character.description: Technical footsies character with strong pokes, Serenity Stream stance mixups, and aerial mobility
character.bio: Former ICPO detective now working as a kung fu teacher. One of the most accomplished martial artists in the world, she never stops training and is always looking for strong opponents.

neutral.name: Neutral Tactics
neutral.description: Moves for controlling space and starting offense

offensive.name: Offensive Pressure
offensive.description: Moves for maintaining pressure and mix-ups

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use as reversal or combo ender. Invincible to strikes and throws frames 1-7. Minimum damage 510 (30%). Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: VERY PUNISHABLE on block. Minus 22. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for air combo ender. Minimum damage 600 (30%). Values do not change on counter or Punish Counter. 16 frames landing recovery.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Movement option.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Quick backward movement with throw invincibility
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape pressure. Invincible to throws frames 1-15.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Movement option. Throw invincible frames 1-15.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Armored attack for pressure and punishes
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to absorb attacks and punish. Super Armor for 2 hits frames 1-27. Wall splat on hit near wall. On Punish Counter or after armor absorb: crumple stun (grounded), spinning knockdown (airborne), +3000 SA gauge.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Has Super Armor. Counter with your own Drive Impact or throw.

chunli_drive_reversal_block.input: â†’ + HP + HK (while blocking or during Drive Parry)

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape pressure while blocking. Completely invincible frames 1-22. Recoverable damage. 7 frames recovery added on hit.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to escape oki pressure. Completely invincible frames 1-20. Recoverable damage. 7 frames recovery added on hit.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Safe on block. Causes knockdown.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to parry attacks. Can cancel from frame 4 via Drive Rush. Parry hitbox extended while buttons held. Only blocks during recovery. Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Chun-Li is in Punish Counter state. Throw or wait for recovery.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Activates when attack absorbed on parry input frame or next frame. For high/overhead: press away. For low: press down-back. No direction = regular parry +3000 Drive. Fully invincible 5 frames after recovery (not if continuing parry). Opponent forced into Punish Counter state until move finished.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: You are in PUNISH COUNTER state until move finishes. Cannot cancel.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Activates when projectile absorbed on parry input frame or next frame. No screen freeze. Opponent forced into Punish Counter state until move finished.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: You are in PUNISH COUNTER state until move finishes. Cannot cancel.

yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use to convert parry into offense. Screen freeze until frame 10. Can cancel into attack on frame 9. Can cancel into non-parry actions from frame 24.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Chun-Li is rushing in. Prepare to block or contest.

yourPerspective.tacticalUse: Cancel normal into run for combos
yourPerspective.whenToUse: Use for combo extensions. Screen freeze until frame 9. Can cancel into attack from frame 10. Can cancel into non-parry actions from frame 25.

opponentPerspective.riskDescription: Chun-Li is canceling into run. Prepare for follow-up.
